metadata.Title: CVE-2023-20569 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - high
metadata.Description:
A side channel vulnerability on some of the AMD CPUs may allow an attackerto influence the return address prediction. This may result in speculativeexecution at an attacker-controlled address, potentially leading toinformation disclosure.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-20569` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

amd64-microcode - 3.20191218.1ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

linux-image-5.15.0-86-generic - 5.15.0-86.96~20.04.1
linux-image-5.15.0-86-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-86.96~20.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-86-generic - 5.15.0-86.96~20.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-86-generic-64k - 5.15.0-86.96~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1047-aws - 5.15.0-1047.52~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1049-azure - 5.15.0-1049.56~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1019-azure-fde - 5.15.0-1049.56~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1044-gcp - 5.15.0-1044.52~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1030-gkeop - 5.15.0-1030.35~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1043-intel-iotg - 5.15.0-1043.49~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-86-lowlatency - 5.15.0-86.95~20.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-86-lowlatency-64k - 5.15.0-86.95~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1045-oracle - 5.15.0-1045.51~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1040-ibm - 5.15.0-1040.43~20.04.1
No subscription required
